# h5-utils
common methods for eleme h5 project.

# Useage

```shell
npm install h5-utils --save
```
or

Global variable
`npm.elemecdn.com/uglifyjs!h5-utils@{{version}}/h5-utils.js`

# Publish
`npm publish` `h5-utils.js` is autobuild when package is published.

# 强依赖
- Promise

# 依赖
- hyBridAPI

# usage
`npm run build`
`npm run dev`
`npm run test`

# Code
- no semicolon
